column5: These seem to be of a good quality.5 layer nylon and breathable.50 bucks off too.  Your thougts?  Thier in the BPS flyer.  http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/CFPage?storeId=10151&catalogId=10001&langId=-1&appID=163&option=3&template=circular.cfm&catalog=sfc_tor_11_tab&storeID=11
OK TY  Shouldnt you be fishing? LOL
i owned a pair and they were comfy but i patched a lot of holes.
We're leaving tonight. Bailed on today because of the weather.

I have a pair of White River waders and they seem decent enough especially for the price, I think they're s tep down from the ones in the flyer (based on the price).  I think the key is getting the right size, if they're tight, they'll hole more easily although if they're too big they'll rub.
I wouldn't bother with those waders even for free.   Lucky if you get a season out of them without any leaks.
Thank you for asking that question Misfish I was going to get them Sunday when I go to bass pro shop but after seeing they're comments I think I am going to save my money now and wait.
